item.title: Research
item.description: a.author{ color: grey; } a.primary{ font-weight: bold; } Refereed Publications Chris Larson, Josef Spjut, Ross Knepper, Robert Shepherd; A deformable interface for human touch recognition using stretchable carbon nanotube dielectric elastomer sensors and deep neural networks, Soft Robotics, October 4, 2019. paper alternate Bibtex@inproceedings{larsonspjut19, author = { Chris Larson and Josef Spjut and Ross Knepper and Robert Shepherd }, title = { {A deformable interface for human touch recognition using stretchable carbon nanotube dielectric elastomer sensors and deep neural networks} }, year = {2019}, booktitle = {Soft Robotics} } Jonghyun Kim, Youngmo Jeong, Michael Stengel, Kaan Aksit, Rachel Albert, Ward Lopes, Trey Greer, Ben Boudaoud, Alexander Majercik, Josef Spjut, Morgan McGuire, David Luebke; Foveated AR: Dynamically-Foveated Augmented Reality Display, ACM SIGGRAPH Proceedings, Los Angeles, July, 2019.
